content.p: The Student Services Centre is a central point for various student services at the University of Nottingham Malaysia. The centre provides support and essential services for all students of the University. If you need any asistance with any related matters, we will always be happy to help. The centre is located at HB13, Block H, Student Association building. Our counter Operating hours are from 9.30am to 5.00pm, Monday - Friday Finance Office Any payments ( tuition and accomodation fees,fine,rental, reprint official documents, etc.) Accommodation Any queries pertaining to On-campus accommodation Visa Any queries related to Student visa ( new application, progression, renewal, etc.) Student Registry Sponsorship telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
